name: Red-Eyes Darkness Metal Dragon (OCG)
text:
(1) You can Special Summon this card (from your hand) by banishing 1 face-up Dragon-Type monster you control. You can only Special Summon [Red-Eyes Darkness Metal Dragon] this way once per turn.

(2) During your Main Phase: You can Special Summon one 1 Dragon-Type monster from your hand or GY except [Red-Eyes Darkness Metal Dragon]. You can only use this effect of [Red-Eyes Darkness Metal Dragon] once per turn.
